title: Energy - types of energy in systems

content.description: A block is at rest in equilibrium on a vertical spring, as shown. Which of the following could correctly indicate the types of energy present in the block-spring-Earth system and in the block-spring system?
content.question: Block-spring-Earth systemBlock-spring systemAGravitational potential energy,spring potential energyGravitational potential energy,spring potential energyBGravitational potential energy,spring potential energySpring potential energyCGravitational potential energy,spring potential energy,kinetic energyGravitational potential energy,spring potential energyDGravitational potential energy,spring potential energy,kinetic energySpring potential energy,kinetic energy

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
